# Role association to plan tabs
<!--- THIS FILE IS GENERATED PLEASE DO NOT EDIT IT DIRECTLY --->

A role association with plan tabs allows you to define access permissions to the different plan tabs for a role.

<OH code="jupRoleToJupUiLayoutTab"/>






## Basic properties {#properties-base}
    
### Can see the tab {#can-see}

Allows the plan tab to be seen by the role

*Technical name:* ```canSee```
<PH code="jupRoleToJupUiLayoutTab:canSee"/>

    

## Associated entities (unique) {#properties-belongs-to}

### Map tab {#jup-ui-layout-tab}

A plan tab defines the different tabs available in the plan viewing interface.

*Technical name:* ```jupUiLayoutTab```
<PH code="jupRoleToJupUiLayoutTab:jupUiLayoutTab"/>

### Role {#jup-role}

A role defines access permissions to features in the user interface

*Technical name:* ```jupRole```
<PH code="jupRoleToJupUiLayoutTab:jupRole"/>
